name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-graph-unreademails
title: Unread Emails Viewer
shortDescription: Checks the users inbox for unread emails
longDescription: This Adaptive Card Extension uses the Microsoft Graph to get unread emails in your inbox and displays that as a ACE

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
